comment.author: 69746795@N05
comment._content: Corner of Barrack St and St Georges Tce

comment.author: 92584555@N07
comment._content: Photo also shows the edge of Stirling Gardens on left edge, and Barrack St Jetty and Perth Esplanade at base of Barrack St.  Jarrah pickets on the fence on the north side of St Georges Tce were required by the Perth City Council as standard fencing material.

comment.author: 92632770@N04
comment._content: On this site in the early 1960's stood the tallest structure in Perth at that time the T & G(The Temperance & General Mutual Life Insurance Company) building
